message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $13,000 is too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $6,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your offer, the value of this product to me is significantly higher.  I could consider letting it go for $11,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you considering my offer.  I'm willing to increase my offer to $7,000, but $11,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend.
